metadata.title: Convert Ounces to Grams – Weight Converter
metadata.description: Convert weight from Ounces (oz) to Grams (g), essential for cooking and nutrition.

introduction: This converter transforms weight measurements from Ounces to Grams, bridging imperial and metric cooking.
Recipes from different countries use different weight units. Understanding conversion is essential for cooking.
This converter uses the standard relationship where 1 ounce equals exactly 28.3495 grams.
methodology: 1 oz = 28.3495 grams. To convert ounces to grams, multiply by 28.3495. For example, 1 oz ≈ 28.35 g, 4 oz ≈ 113.4 g.
Cooking recipes require precise ingredient measurements. Converting between imperial and metric units is essential.
Nutrition labels use grams while ingredient measurements use ounces in the US.
This converter provides precise weight conversions for cooking and nutrition.
examples: Example 1 – Chocolate: 8 ounces of chocolate = 226.8 grams.
Example 2 – Flour: 2.5 ounces of flour = 70.9 grams.
Example 3 – Butter: 4 ounces of butter = 113.4 grams.

faqs.question: What is the conversion from Ounces to Grams?
faqs.answer: 1 oz = 28.3495 grams. Multiply ounces by 28.3495 to get grams.

faqs.question: How many grams in a pound?
What is the metric equivalent of a cup?
faqs.answer: 1 cup varies by ingredient. Water: 240 mL = 240 grams. Flour: ~120 grams.

glossary.definition: Imperial unit of weight equal to 1/16 pound or 28.3495 grams.
Metric unit of mass, standard for cooking and nutrition.
